body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, Retro Round Keycap Typewriter Keyboard with Phone/Tablet Holder, Cute Colorful Keyboard for Computer/Laptop/Windows/Mac by SABLUTE, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 53 mins
features: 【Colorful Retro Typewriter Keyboard】SABLUTE Wireless Keyboard and Mouse - the perfect combination of vintage aesthetics and modern functionality. Experience the touch of a typewriter keyboard, enhanced with colorful round keycaps. The retro round keycaps not only add a unique and stylish look but also provide a comfortable and satisfying typing experience.

【Specific Devices Holder 】This colorful keyboard is equipped with an additional space to place your phone, tablet, or other gadgets, allowing you to easily deposit your device while working or browsing, it’s all within reach.

【2.4 GHz Stable Wireless Connection】Enjoy the freedom of wireless connectivity up to 33 ft without the hassle of cords anymore. One USB receiver can connect both the keyboard and mouse (Stored in the mouse's battery compartment). No Delay, No Dropout.

【Multifunctional Silent Mouse】The wireless mouse is designed to be ultra silent, providing a quiet and peaceful working environment. With 3 DPI levels (800/1200/1600) for precise and smooth navigation on a wide range of surfaces. It also features forward and backward shortcut keys, making it portable for page navigation and file browsing.

【Comfort Design & Removable Keycap 】The foldable feet ensure a comfortable typing position and reduce strain on your wrists. Additionally, the computer mouse is contoured to fit perfectly in your hand, minimizing fatigue during extended use. And removable keycaps for easy cleaning.

【Universal Compatibility & 24 Months Support】Supports Windows, Mac OS, Chrome OS, Linux and any device with usb ports. If you encounter any problems in using the product, please feel free to contact our 24H Online customer service team, enjoying 24 Months Warranty. NOTE: Some multimedia function are not available with Mac OS.

【 Valentine's Day Gifts for Her】This cute and stylish keyboard mouse combo is the best gift for your Girlfriend, Wife, Partner, Kids, and Best Friend on Valentine's Day, Anniversary, Birthdays, Mother's Day, Christmas Day, Or Any Anniversaries to make her workspace stand out. It's perfect for you to express love boldly and remind her uncontrollably of your love as she types.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Wireless、Round Keycap、Phone Holder、Noiseless、Auto Sleep、Responsive、Typewriter Style、Detachable Keycap See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use the shortcut keys? Press any function key together with the Fn key. NOTE: Some multimedia function are not available with Mac OS. How many receivers does this wireless combo have? Keyboard and mouse share ONE USB receiver. Does it have an On/Off switch? Wireless keyboard and mouse both have an On/Off switch for saving power. When will the keyboard mouse combo enter sleep mode? Idle for 10min, keyboard and mouse sleep. Press any key to wake it up. What does the package include? 1*Wireless Keyboard, 1*Wireless Mouse, 1*2.4GHz USB Receiver,1*UserManual, NOTE: batteries NOT included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Cute, and Useful
reviews.reviewText: I bought this keyboard because of its super cute color combo and because it has a phone/tablet holder. The phone holder is super useful and holds my phone(galaxy s23) and my partners(galaxy z fold). It did take a few days for the keys to loosen up as we live in a very cold area but now that it's been hooked up for a few days the keys are super soft and smooth when typing. I love that the product has a auto sleep function so I don't waste batteries.You do need two different types of batteries which is annoying but not a deal breaker. The keyboard does feel super light when you open the box and feels rather like a toy versus an actual keyboard but it works great. I also love the mouse, it has a super satisfying click. Honestly for the price, quality and design im over the moon. It makes working more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE IT
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard! It's my favorite color and it works as expected. I have not had any issues thus far. The mouse is a bonus as well. The only thing I don't like is the fact that it is not compatible with my Macbook so some functions don't work if you have a Macbook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard and Mouse dies quickly
reviews.reviewText: I got this for work and school. I noticed after changing the batteries, the keyboard and mouse dies really quickly after a few hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty color
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty and gas a lot of key features

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's been a while since I had wireless keyboard and mouse. Been using wired for the last few years. My old mouse finally bit the dust and I decided to go wireless again and went for the matching set. Love that they are connected to a single USB connection. Both are so quiet...amazing. truly plug and play....I pulled it all out of the box, added the batteries, plugged in the USB, turned devices on and went on with my work. love that it was so seamless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard randomly stopped working
reviews.reviewText: Was really excited to use the product and the key board and mouse were working fine for about a week until the keyboard started to fail. Now the keyboard won’t operate even with fresh new batteries. No way to get it to respond but the mouse still works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks great but disappointed
reviews.reviewText: As a keyboard, it's great and I love that it and the mouse have on/off switches. However, personally, I absolutely love the sound of a keyboard and bought this specifically because I thought it was going to sound like my last one that looked just like it. Nowhere in the description does it say silent keys and yet I get them. It feels like there's something sticky under my keys all the time because of the silencing of it. Looks great but I hate it. I miss the dopamine the sounds of the keys gave me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much FUN!!
reviews.reviewText: Shipping was super fast and the colors are incredibly vibrant! Works just as described and is super comfy to type on. I type 75wpm and the keys keep up with me without a delay - I am so so so happy with this purchase :) Already thinking about getting the other colors just to keep my office interesting <3
